Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2341 of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE ยง 2-218.41

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Each agency, including an agency that contracts or procures in whole or in part through the Office of Contracting and Procurement, shall exercise its contracting and procurement authority so as to meet, on an annual basis, the goal of procuring and contracting 50% of the dollar volume of its goods and services, including construction goods and services, to small business enterprises.
The dollar volume referenced in subsection (a) of this section shall be based on the expendable budget of the agency.

subchapter.text: Small, Local, and Disadvantaged Business Enterprise Development and Assistance.

heading.catch_text: Goals for District agencies with respect to contracting and procurement with small business enterprises.
